about_the_game:
Community activity

The community does not regularly raffle SteamKey activities for free

Game introduction:


A Romantic Fantasy Text Adventure in Another World

Step into the shoes of a young woman who suddenly discovers she's the "wicked antagonist" in a novel. Can you help her change her fate when she realizes she's destined to be a tragic character?

Will you continue to play the villain, or strive to become the true protagonist? Will you pursue personal happiness, or save others from peril? The power is in your hands.

Embark on this extraordinary journey, exploring the deeper meanings of identity, destiny, and self-worth. Every choice you make could alter the course of the entire story. Let's redefine what it truly means to be the "main character"!

Are you ready to challenge fate and rewrite your story? Begin your magical adventure at the noble academy now!

Key game mechanics include:

  • Dialogue Choices: Carefully select dialogue options to influence your relationships with other characters.
  • Relationship Building: Interact with potential love interests to form friendships or develop romances.
  • Branching Storylines: Your choices as a player will lead the story towards multiple different endings.

Plot follow-up

We currently have the beginning of the story, and other character lines throughout the story, which will be updated through DLC in the future

Inform

We regret the subpar English text experience. Due to budgetary constraints, our studio is currently unable to provide professional English translations, and must rely on machine translation for the time being. We deeply apologize for the poor English text quality, but appreciate your continued interest and support for our game!
